WRITING.TITLE: Did I get the ringed city today or...?
WRITING.TEXT: I play on Steam and I got the season pass back in November. Steam isn't letting me launch DS3 because I need 20.7gb free disk space. Is this just the most recent patch or is it the DLC? I really hope it's the DLC because I went on a deleting spree and could only free up 18gb
At OP, I'm interested in a similar trip. Do you have an estimate on how much this is costing you?
